policies.privacyDesc: En Neural Code Lab, tu privacidad es muy importante para nosotros. Esta pol√≠tica detalla c√≥mo manejamos tus datos e informaci√≥n personal.

policies.privacyProtectionDesc: En Neural Code Lab, valoramos tu privacidad y estamos comprometidos a proteger tus datos personales. Esta pol√≠tica de privacidad explica c√≥mo recopilamos, utilizamos y protegemos tu informaci√≥n.
policies.infoCollectionDesc: Recopilamos informaci√≥n personal cuando te registras en nuestros servicios, utilizas nuestras aplicaciones o interact√∫as con nosotros. Esta informaci√≥n puede incluir tu nombre, direcci√≥n de correo electr√≥nico y otra informaci√≥n relevante.

policies.dataProtectionDesc: Implementamos medidas de seguridad adecuadas para proteger tu informaci√≥n personal contra accesos no autorizados, alteraciones y divulgaci√≥n.
policies.userRightsDesc: Tienes derecho a acceder, corregir y eliminar tu informaci√≥n personal. Puedes contactarnos en cualquier momento para ejercer estos derechos.
policies.section1Desc: Recopilamos informaci√≥n personal cuando te registras en nuestras aplicaciones, navegas por nuestro sitio web o realizas una compra. Esta informaci√≥n puede incluir tu nombre, direcci√≥n de correo electr√≥nico, y detalles de pago en el caso de aplicaciones de pago.

policies.section2Desc: La informaci√≥n recopilada es utilizada para proporcionar, mantener y mejorar nuestros servicios. Tambi√©n puede ser utilizada para personalizar tu experiencia o para fines de marketing directo, en caso de haber dado tu consentimiento.
policies.paymentDesc: En el caso de las aplicaciones de pago, la informaci√≥n de pago es procesada de manera segura a trav√©s de plataformas de terceros.
policies.section3Desc: Nuestras aplicaciones gratuitas funcionan bajo un modelo de donaciones, y toda la informaci√≥n proporcionada por los usuarios se trata con la misma confidencialidad que en nuestras aplicaciones de pago.
policies.freeAppsDesc: Las aplicaciones gratuitas son mantenidas gracias a las contribuciones de la comunidad. Puedes apoyarnos a trav√©s de plataformas como Patreon.

policies.section4Desc: No vendemos, intercambiamos ni transferimos tu informaci√≥n personal a terceros sin tu consentimiento, a menos que sea requerido por la ley. Solo compartimos informaci√≥n con proveedores de servicios que nos ayudan a operar nuestras aplicaciones, siempre bajo estrictos acuerdos de confidencialidad.

policies.downloadDesc: Puedes descargar una copia completa de nuestras pol√≠ticas en el siguiente enlace:
policies.termsDesc: Al utilizar nuestras aplicaciones, aceptas estos t√©rminos de servicio. Si no est√°s de acuerdo con alguno de estos t√©rminos, no debes utilizar nuestras aplicaciones.
policies.useAppsDesc: Nuestras aplicaciones se proporcionan para uso personal y no comercial. No debes modificar, copiar o distribuir el software sin nuestro permiso.

policies.privacyDesc: At Neural Code Lab, your privacy is very important to us. This policy details how we handle your data and personal information.
policies.appPoliciesDesc: Consult the policies of our free and paid applications.
policies.privacyProtectionDesc: At Neural Code Lab, we value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use and protect your information.
policies.infoCollectionDesc: We collect personal information when you register for our services, use our applications or interact with us. This information may include your name, email address and other relevant information.
policies.usageDesc: We use the information collected to provide you with our services, improve our applications, and communicate relevant updates and offers.
policies.dataProtectionDesc: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration and disclosure.
policies.userRightsDesc: You have the right to access, correct and delete your personal information. You can contact us at any time to exercise these rights.
policies.section1Desc: We collect personal information when you register in our applications, browse our website, or make a purchase. This information may include your name, email address, and payment details in the case of paid applications.
policies.cookiesDesc: We use cookies and similar technologies to improve user experience and obtain browsing data on our website.
policies.section2Desc: The information collected is used to provide, maintain, and improve our services. It may also be used to personalize your experience or for direct marketing purposes, if you have given your consent.
policies.paymentDesc: In the case of paid applications, payment information is processed securely through third-party platforms.
policies.section3Desc: Our free applications work under a donation model, and all information provided by users is treated with the same confidentiality as in our paid applications.
policies.freeAppsDesc: Free applications are maintained thanks to community contributions. You can support us through platforms like Patreon.
policies.paidAppsDesc: Paid applications offer advanced features and additional support. All payment information is handled securely.
policies.section4Desc: We do not sell, trade, or transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, unless required by law. We only share information with service providers who help us operate our applications, always under strict confidentiality agreements.
policies.section5Desc: We implement a variety of security measures to ensure the protection of your personal information. We use encryption technologies and authentication systems to secure sensitive data.
policies.downloadDesc: You can download a full copy of our policies at the following link:
policies.termsDesc: By using our applications, you accept these terms of service. If you do not agree with any of these terms, you must not use our applications.
policies.useAppsDesc: Our applications are provided for personal and non-commercial use. You must not modify, copy, or distribute the software without our permission.
policies.liabilityDesc: We are not responsible for any damage or loss that may arise from the use of our applications. You use our applications at your own risk.
policies.modificationsDesc: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. We will notify you of any major changes through our communication channels.
policies.donationDesc: Neural Code Lab offers free and paid applications. We appreciate and depend on donations to maintain and improve our free applications.
policies.donationsDetail: Donations are used exclusively for the development and maintenance of our applications. You can make a donation through our Patreon page.
policies.transparencyDesc: We will publish periodic reports on how donations are used to ensure transparency and accountability in the use of funds.
